---
title: "Daily To-Do List"
format: html
title-block-banner: true  # Enable title block banner
description: "Ini adalah To-do list Hariz seharian."
---

<style>
    .container {
        background-color: white;
        padding: 20px;
        border-radius: 8px;
        box-shadow: 0 0 10px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
    }

    ul {
        list-style-type: none;
        padding: 0;
    }

    li {
        margin: 10px 0;
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
    }

    .task {
        margin-right: 10px;
    }

    .completed {
        text-decoration: line-through;
        color: grey;
    }
</style>
<div style="width: 50%;background-color: white;padding: 20px;border-radius: 14px;">
<ul id="todo-list">
    <li><input type="checkbox" class="task"> <span class="task-text">Task 1</span></li>
    <li><input type="checkbox" class="task"> <span class="task-text">Task 2</span></li>
    <li><input type="checkbox" class="task"> <span class="task-text">Task 3</span></li>
</ul>
</div>
<script>
    document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', () => {
        const tasks = document.querySelectorAll('.task');
        const taskTexts = document.querySelectorAll('.task-text');

        // Load saved tasks state from local storage
        tasks.forEach((task, index) => {
            const taskState = localStorage.getItem(`task${index}`);
            if (taskState === 'checked') {
                task.checked = true;
                taskTexts[index].classList.add('completed');
            }
        });

        // Save task state on change and toggle strikethrough
        tasks.forEach((task, index) => {
            task.addEventListener('change', () => {
                if (task.checked) {
                    localStorage.setItem(`task${index}`, 'checked');
                    taskTexts[index].classList.add('completed');
                } else {
                    localStorage.setItem(`task${index}`, 'unchecked');
                    taskTexts[index].classList.remove('completed');
                }
            });
        });

        // Check if the date has changed
        const lastVisit = localStorage.getItem('lastVisit');
        const today = new Date().toDateString();

        if (lastVisit !== today) {
            // Reset all tasks
            tasks.forEach((task, index) => {
                task.checked = false;
                taskTexts[index].classList.remove('completed');
                localStorage.setItem(`task${index}`, 'unchecked');
            });
            localStorage.setItem('lastVisit', today);
        }
    });
</script>
